title: Reddit Migrate
description: A simple interface to migrate Reddit account data from an old account to a new account using Reddit APIs.

title: HR Bot
description: AI-powered chatbot using LangChain and OpenAI APIs, capable of answering 90% of common HR queries without human intervention

title: Lead Generation
description: Lead generation application that scrapes data from different sources, transforms it, and stores it in a database. It then matches the data with ICPs provided by the client and stores the new leads in the database. Built the pipeline using Python, Kafka, and Machine Learning Models and Open AI APIs
